# Spaceship Game - Project Instructions

## Project Overview
A simple HTML5 spaceship game where users can control a spaceship using arrow keys with a retro space theme.

## Project Type
- HTML/CSS/JavaScript (Static Web Project)
- No build process required
- No external dependencies

## Files Structure
- `index.html` - Main game HTML file
- `style.css` - Game styling and layout
- `script.js` - Game logic and controls
- `README.md` - Project documentation

## How to Run
Open `index.html` directly in any modern web browser.

## Controls
- Arrow Up (↑) - Move spaceship up
- Arrow Down (↓) - Move spaceship down
- Arrow Left (←) - Move spaceship left
- Arrow Right (→) - Move spaceship right

## Game Features
- Smooth spaceship movement with collision detection
- Real-time position display
- Boundary constraints (spaceship stays within game area)
- Retro space-themed visual design

## Development Notes
- No dependencies to install
- No build steps required
- Edit files and refresh browser to see changes
- Uses vanilla JavaScript with requestAnimationFrame for smooth 60 FPS gameplay
